name: location
description: Get the user's current location including coordinates and optional reverse-geocoded address.

includeAddress.description: Whether to include reverse-geocoded address information

examples.output:
You are at: 1 Infinite Loop, Cupertino, CA 95014
Coordinates: 37.3318, -122.0312

notes: Requires location permission from the user
Address lookup uses Apple Maps reverse geocoding
Accuracy depends on available location services (GPS, Wi-Fi, cellular)
